./PmergeMe 1 6 8 7 871 62 5 49 497 2 3 77 88
test simple : ./PmergeMe 10 7 4 3 6 5 9
test algo : ./PmergeMe 51 15 85 99 28 40 13 76 64 82 34 67 42 95 55 100 8 19
./PmergeMe `shuf -i 1-100000 -n 3000 | tr "\n" " "`
./PmergeMe `shuf -i 1-100000 -n 2999 | tr "\n" " "` > hola
./PmergeMe 2401 8521 9714 17064 24342 39519 43924 44609 47245 54159 56202 71617 73184 76389 76523 76595 80585 82447 90811 87224

99929 99947 99932

99947
